definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
to gather up/to collect/to edit/to compile

sentences.english: The Wealth Creation Series is a series of 8 one-minute episodes.
sentences.chinese: 致富系列是一套八集，每集一分鐘的電視特輯。

sentences.english: We will let you know when the songs and the specials will be released when we know.
sentences.chinese: 我們一知道了新歌和特輯的發佈時間，就會告訴你。

sentences.english: Anyone giving $10 or more will be able to download a collection of new songs.
sentences.chinese: 捐款10美元及以上的人們可以下載新歌特輯。

sentences.english: The new pilot is called Ghost Hunters: College Edition.
sentences.chinese: 新一期的節目叫做幽靈獵人校園特輯。

sentences.english: Do you want to see a Transformers 3 Trailer on this Featurette?
sentences.chinese: 你想在這個特輯看到一個變形金剛3預告片？

sentences.english: Their second album, Ancora, was released in November 2005.
sentences.chinese: 在2005年他們出版發行第二張特輯“安科拉”。

sentences.english: Protecting the President is this month's National Geographic Channel feature.
sentences.chinese: 本月份國家地理頻道播出《第一保鏢》特輯。

definition: to depart as quick as a flash/flash mob
photobook (loanword from Japanese), generally sexy portraits of an actress or model
to learn sth over again/to review/to brush up/to revive (memories, friendship etc)
record of actual events/documentary (factual rather than fictional)
opera (or role) involving much singing and action/(fig.) highlight/main feature/major activity
carefully chosen/handpicked/best of the bunch/choice (product)/concentration (mining)/to concentrate/to winnow
large-scale Chinese opera/Beijing opera/major dramatic production (movie, TV series etc)
to make a pilgrimage (to visit a holy site)/to go on a sightseeing tour
